caption: A progressive rock epic with complex time signatures, intricate guitar work, and dynamic male vocals. Features extended instrumental passages, synthesizer layers, and dramatic shifts between soft and heavy sections.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Waking in a world that's not my own
Seeds of doubt have long been sown
Reality is bending at the seams
Can't tell the difference between life and dreams

[Verse 2]
Clockwork minds and digital souls
Playing predetermined roles
Are we the masters or the slaves
Of the futures that we crave

[Chorus]
Parallel dimensions collide
Nowhere left to run and hide
The truth is stranger than we know
Let the revelation flow

[Instrumental]

[Verse 3]
Quantum leaps through space and time
Searching for the paradigm
Every answer breeds more questions still
Climbing up the endless hill

[Chorus]
Parallel dimensions collide
Nowhere left to run and hide

[Outro]
